title: Closing the gap between open-source and commercial large language models for medical evidence summarization
details: G Zhang, Q Jin, Y Zhou, S Wang, BR Idnay, Y Luo… - arXiv preprint arXiv …, 2024
abstract: Large language models (LLMs) hold great promise in summarizing medical evidence. Most recent studies focus on the application of proprietary LLMs. Using proprietary LLMs introduces multiple risk factors, including a lack of transparency …
